original_title: Boots, Biceps and Bulges: The Life & Works of Tom of Finland
overview: Tom of Finland's drawings have become icons in the gay community for their hyper-sexuality and exageration of all traits masculine. In this short documentary Tom himself (in voice over) describes his life and how he came to develop his own style of drawing. Included are many many samples of his work.
title: Boots, Biceps and Bulges: The Life & Works of Tom of Finland
